instructions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
instructions.2: Put butter in 13x9-inch baking pan and place in oven until melted. Swirl to coat bottom and sides with butter.
instructions.3: Spread graham cracker crumbs evenly over bottom of pan. Layer chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, and walnuts over crumbs. Pour condensed milk over walnuts and sprinkle with coconut.
instructions.4: Bake in preheated oven until edges are golden brown, about 25 minutes.

questions.question: In Step 2, is the oven from Step 1 being used?
Is oven from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is butterscotch chips from Step 3 still available in Step 5?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 2?
Can we put (Step 2) and bake (Step 4) at the same time?
